description.text: Software developer with passion in AI & backend systems and will create blazingly fast web experiences with the bleeding edge BASE tech stack

text: I'm a software developer with a background in computer engineering and over a year of experience building Python-based software.

After working with Python systems, I shifted my focus to backend development using modern tools like Bun, Supabase, and ElysiaJS as part of the BASE stack, with a purpose on building blazingly fast web services and APIs, using Astro when an interface is needed.
I also work with cloud platforms and use container technologies to deploy, scale, and manage my applications more efficiently.
Outside of coding, I like exploring new tools, tinkering ESP and arduinos, and reading state-of-the-art AI techs to keep me up to date to AI Advancements
